author: rubys
msg: Fix a number of ArrayOutOfBounds and NullPointerExceptions primarily due
to the values of RPCElement and namespace being either never set or set
late.
Additionally, support the serviceDescription for setting the names of
input parameters.
***ALL*** normally the server is pretty much content to ignore the name
of the individual params, but this is not the currently the case for the
client.  However, I will contend that a fairly common case is that there
is a single output parameter, and we can easily provide the ability to
be insensitive to the name returned in that case.  From the interop tests,
this makes the client able to talk to more servers who have their own
preference for naming conventions.  I welcome criticism of both the overall
idea, and the way in which I chose to implement it at this time.

author: rubys
msg: Fix bug whereby the AdminClient would cause NullPointerExceptions in
any call which attempted to read from a URL.  Note: no unit or
function tests were affected by the removal of the offending function,
so ***GLEN*** please review this change.
Re-introduced the function test, but treat the fault generated by being
off the net as a success (Note: this surfaced another bug, so adding
intentional fault tests is on my todo list).

author: rubys
msg: Eliminate NullPointerException in SOAPFault - the Microsoft implementation
chooses to format and indent their elements.

author: rubys
msg: Normalize XML text.  Note: the normalize routine will need to be
optimized.

author: rubys
msg: Fix a class cast exception
